1 / 3
Jayhawkville is the innovative, virtual school district designed for students in the online master’s degree programs at KU. Designed to simulate a variety of real-world scenarios, this unique learning tool allows you to gain problem-solving experience in urban, rural, wealthy, low-income, racially diverse, high-performing, and other types of schools.
Caption Text

Jayhawkville is the innovative, virtual school district designed for students in the online master’s degree programs at KU. Designed to simulate a variety of real-world scenarios, this unique learning tool allows you to gain problem-solving experience in urban, rural, wealthy, low-income, racially diverse, high-performing, and other types of schools.
